import { useState } from 'react' import '../Pages/draft-styles.css' import { champlist } from './temp-champ-list' import { BlueSummonerList } from '../App/Types/champ-select-types' /* need the champ select boxes to be constant size lock in/confirm button ban display three links (draft captains + spectator) */ export const Draft = () => { const [index,setIndex] = useState(0) const [blueList, setBlueList] = useState() const ChampList = () => { return(
{champlist.map((item)=>{ return(
{setSummoner({name:item[0],icon:item[1]})}}>
)})}
) } return(
Blue Bans
Red Bans
) }
